title: This Meeting is the Greatest Blessing

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: ...Top Road-san. Among the lights of our generation, of what manner is yours?

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: When she asked me, I couldn't put an answer into words.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: I couldn't think of an answer... because I'm not as unique as everyone else. I may have thought that, at least a little bit.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: But...!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: ――Digital-chan, this script was amazing! But... my role's pretty important, isn't it? Are you sure about this?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Whatever do you mean? The Santa King is the glue that holds the group together. Just like you are for the others.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: When Opera O-san read it, she said "The presence of the Santa King has magnified the rulers' brilliance myraidfold!"

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
...Eheheh.
Then it looks like I'll have to work even harder!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: By the way, Digital-chan. How's the rest of the production going? You look really tired to me...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: ...Uhh.... well... I've got a good idea for the costumes, but for the rest... "The grind waits for no one", you know what I mean? Haha. Hahaha...

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
The grind...? So, basically, you're in a pinch?
You shouldn't try to handle this all by yourself! Let's split up the work!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
"The more I admire you, the darker my dorknesh..."
Ugh... I goofed up again...

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Hey there, Doto-chan.
Looks like you're having trouble with your lines, huh...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
I am... I just can't get it right...
Ughhhhnn... What should I dooooo?

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Hmm... How about you practice with me――
No, with everyone? I think it'd help a lot.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
――Oh, Top Road-san. Making the rounds?
Would you like to rehearse our lines together?

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Whoa... Opera O-chan, you're so good at acting...!
You're on a completely different level from the rest of us...

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: I am more versed in the art, after all. However, there is no need for you to match my skill. All you need to do is immerse yourselves in your roles!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: ......Opera O-chan. Please, teach us how to do that!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Ayabe-san! Let's rehearse together!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: ...You don't need to make those puppy dog eyes. I'll practice with you.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
...There's still a lot that needs to be done. I'm sorry...
I'm planning to spend a whole day to grind it all out!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Then how about we set up a day for everyone to work?
Oh, I know! Let's make it a weekend work day!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
――Well, here we are!
It's time for our weekend work day!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: ...Hang on, when did it get to this point...?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: HAHAHAHA! It's as if the scene transitioned seamlessly from her suggestion to the real thing! So this is what Top Road-san can make happen when she puts her everything into it.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
For a play, we all need to be in it together! 
If we rehearse and work on the play as a group, we can really get things done!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: And so, Opera O-chan, we're ready to be your acting students! It's best to leave the teaching to the expert, after all.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Of course!
Now, then... Let's begin by gauging your skills, shall we?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Hmm... I see, I see.
――Digital-kun, are the costumes ready yet?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Ah, well, the Sun King costume isn't done yet, but the rest of them are ready to go!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Mm. Let's return.
Once we do, all of you will change into your costumes!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Whoa! Your dress is the same as the one from the park, Ayabe-san!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
It is... It's impressive how good a copy it is.
Oh... The brooch on our waists... They match.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: So, about that, the backstory there is the Ice King gave it to the Santa King as a thank-you gift! The Ice King is the one who wanted them to match, you know~ Hehehe!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Is that it? Ayabe-san wanted to match with me...
Wait, no! It's was the character, not her! Hehehe, sorry for the mix-up!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Okay... we're all changed now.
So what's next?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
You'll be spending a day as your roles!
You must think kingly thoughts, and act as a king would!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Huh!? ...Um, can you explain why?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: It is not enough for your performance to be artful. The true value of this production is that it was built by all our hands.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: It may seem you are merely playing roles, but I want to put your hearts into this play. Consider this practice for becoming one with your roles.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Okay... I understand. Let's do it!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Uwahhhh... I- I don't know if I can do iiit...

text_block_list.name: The Three
text_block_list.text:
............
...What on earth are we doing...

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Come now, there's nothing to be learned from silence!
And Ayabe-san, do you truly think the Ice King would say something like that?

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: ...O-okay, then, Ice King and King of Darkness! And, Sun King too! Time to start our meeting. Let's fill our glasses and have a good time.
Hang on. How is this fair? Your role speaks the way you normally do.
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: A-ya-be-san?

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: What's the matter, Ice King? Are you hurting at all?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
......Indeed. My head is aching.
So I may occasionally speak in an uncharacteristic manner.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Pff...! W-well, there's not much we can do about that...
You know, you're not nearly as cold as I thought you'd be!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Pizza's here, everyone! Let's break for lunch!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
..................
Uuhhh... Through the gap... Just put the pizza in...!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Y-you don't need to keep that on, Doto-chan!
There's no way you can eat like that!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
Oh, my, Santa King. Are you quite well?
I do not recall you using that manner of speech.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Huh!? What's wrong wi... Why would it be improper, given the situation!? In addition, should we not be donning aprons? We would not want our clothes to be sullied!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Aha, ahahahaha! You're doing marvelously, my dear kings!
